input: Winter brings snow. Cozy fires warm the evenings. Hot cocoa comforts the soul.
output:
**

Winter brings snow. Cozy fires warm the evenings.

Tentative steps will be taken to minimize damage from extreme cold.
Cold weather can cause power outages, especially during winter storms.
  • The primary concern is protecting people and property.
  • Friable ice and frozen precipitation pose a significant threat.

Power companies will be working around the clock to restore service as soon as possible.

Stay informed by checking your local news and social media for updates on snow removal efforts.
